public_speech: To ask the Secretary of State for Education, what discussions she has had with relevant stakeholders on reform of the parental complaints process to include mandatory mediation.

relevance_summary.summary: The interests flagged as relevant include the MP's position as the Chair (Director & Trustee) of the Centre for Effective Dispute Resolution Limited (CEDR) and their role as Chair of The Alternative Dispute Resolution (ADR) Taskforce for Electricity Network Infrastructure. These roles suggest a vested interest in promoting mediation and dispute resolution processes, aligning with the MP's advocacy for incorporating mandatory mediation into the parental complaints process in education.

relevant_interests.reason: The MP is asking about introducing mandatory mediation in the parental complaints process, and they are the Chair (Director & Trustee) of the Centre for Effective Dispute Resolution Limited (CEDR), which focuses on dispute resolution. This connection suggests a potential interest in promoting mediation, potentially benefiting CEDR's mission, even though the role is unpaid.

regmem_entry.content: Chair, (Director & Trustee) of Centre for Effective Dispute Resolution Limited (CEDR). This is an unpaid role.
